channel.title: A few simple questions
channel.description: How do I change the max stat to 99,nd change the max combat to 138?

item.title: A few simple questions
item.dc:creator: @b1g_th13f b1g th13f
item.description:
@b1g_th13f wrote:

Go into client.java
Search for for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) {
You should see somthing like this [code] for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}
}
return 100;

}[/code]

change the 100â€™s to 99.
You cant get your max cb to 138 if your max lvl is 99

Read full topic
